name: Long Knight
description:
Disclaimer

The downloadable version runs a lot more smoothly so please try that one.

Description

An RTS/ Tower defense game where you defend your castle from invaders. 

Try the campaign or the endless mode.

Controls

PC:

[LMB] to select/deselect troops

[RMB] to move troops to specific place and on fort to replenish

Android:

[1-Touch] to select/deselect troops

[2-Touch (two fingers at the same time)] to move troops to specific place and on fort to replenish

Created by

Johannes Higatzberger (https://itch.io/profile/seschoscho)

Georgios Kletsas (https://geqwe.itch.io/)

Rate and comment for feedback. It's much appreciated as we would like to improve the game.

Next steps on development:

1. Online leaderboard for endless mode

2. Multiplayer matchmaking where two opponents set up their attacking forces and defend the other's
